name: Minesweeper P8
description:
Version 1.0.1

Your goal is to clear all of the tiles on the board, and flag all of the mines. Use the numbers you find to figure out where the mines are : each number tells you how many of the surrounding 8 tiles (up/down, left/right or diagonal) are mines. How fast can you clear the entire board ?

Controls :
Directional arrows : move the cursor
[Z], [C] or [N] : reveal hidden tiles
[X], [V] or [M] : place a flag or a mark (?) on the selected tile
[A] or [Q] : restart the game
[Shift] : back to main menu
[Ctrl] + [R] : reboot the console
